doc: Sequential sensor firings of a com.orcatech.sensor.line.segment
name: walkSegment

fields.name: order
fields.doc: Order number for the current sensor pair

fields.name: firstSensor
fields.doc: A unique id representing the item (i.e. first sensor in the pair) in the ORCATECH Inventory database

fields.name: secondSensor
fields.doc: A unique id representing the item (i.e. second sensor in the pair) in the ORCATECH Inventory database

fields.name: duration
fields.doc: Time differential between the firings of each sensor in seconds

fields.name: assumed
fields.doc: True if the distance is null and was assumed to be 2 feet, false if the distance was measured and entere

fields.name: distance
fields.doc: Distance between the sensors in centimeters
